channel.title: Margo Price on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Margo Price Changed Song Lyrics to Rip “Fascists” on What Could Be the Final ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’
item.description: As if “Don’t Let the Bastards Get You Down” didn’t send enough of a direct message through its original composition.
